La Traviata [unknown arranger]
Kerne Bridge, Herefordshire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £10 and cup, 2nd £5, 3rd £2. March contest - 1st Varteg, 2nd Lydney. Contest not held in 1932. 6 bands competed.
Sept. 14, 2013, 6:40 a.m. April 13, 2018, 1:14 p.m.
